nodes.text: Spetbecca was a Wookiee who ran the Great Hoary Mastmot Trading Station on Toola shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire. Spetbecca rescued a Human named Haaken Baranar after they were mauled by a snow demon. While Baranar recovered, Spetbecca was captured by bounty hunters. Baranar took over the running of the trading post, hopeful that Spetbecca would one day return.
